page.title: 19SEWAGE DISPOSAL
page.content: THE SEWAGE TANKER DRAWS UP TO OUR HOUSE. THE DRIVER COMES TO THE DOOR AND HE ASKS US IF WE WANT THE PIT FULLY EMPTYING OR ONLY HALF EMPTYING. WE SAY HALF EMPTYING. HE FINDS A SAFE SPOT TO PARK. THEN TAKES OFF THE PIPE AT THE SIDE OF THE TANKER. NORMALLY THERE ARE TWO MEN. THEY TAKE THE PIPE TO THE CESSPOOL AND START THE PUMP AND EMPTY IT HALF WAY. THEY KNOW HOW DEEP IT IS. THEY HAVE A BIG ENOUGH TANKER. THEY HAVE TO TAKE THE COVER OFF THE POOL AND PUT IT BACK ON TIGHTLY. AFTERWARDS THEY SWITCH OFF THE MOTOR AND FIX THE PIPE TO THE TANKER AGAIN AND DRIVE AWAY. BEFORE THEY GO DOWN THE ROAD THEY CLOSE THE END SO THAT SEWAGE DOESN'T ESCAPE. THE COUNCIL SEWAGE TANKERS TAKE THEIR LOADS TO A SEWAGE WORKS AND LOCAL FARMERS SPREAD THEIRS ON THEIR FIELDS.
